name: Helios
description: Helios is a FREE and open-source third-party add-on developed by the community. It is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that you have to provide and are publicly available on the internet.
author: Davy

changeLogs.4.2.9: handle provider with missing required properties
changeLogs.4.2.7: Fix shared issue. Handle Outplayer for iOS
changeLogs.4.2.4: Use latest dependencies + fix some bugs with RD
changeLogs.4.2.2: Fix issue on last version of VLC for iOS
changeLogs.4.2.1:
Fix:
- provider could be deleted on automatic update if network issue
- share feature stop working
- File explorer: PM links inside directories weren't not showing
changeLogs.4.2.0: Search for infohash if magnet link not found (from PR #78 thanks to Minefield)
